scripts.all: npm run js-minify-dev && npm run css-min && npm run build-html
scripts.js-minify-prod: terser src/js/console.js src/js/arrayExtension.js src/js/jquery-extension-scroller.js src/js/conclusionBuilder.js src/js/formValidation.js src/js/sequence.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js -c ecma=5,ie8=true,drop_console=true -m
scripts.js-minify-dev: terser src/js/console.js src/js/arrayExtension.js src/js/jquery-extension-scroller.js src/js/conclusionBuilder.js src/js/formValidation.js src/js/sequence.js src/js/testDriver.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.css: npm run css-min && npm run css-icons
